original_text: And over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground was Ezri the son of Chelub:
korean_text: 글룹의 아들 에스리는 밭 가는 농민을 거느렸고

sentences.original_text: And over them that did the work of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 밭에서 일하는 사람들을 다스리는 자는

sentences.original_text: for tillage of the ground was Ezri
